Example modeled after http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/authoring_basics.html  
The [R source](R-Markdown-Basics.Rmd) that made this document.

###Emphasis
```
*italic*   **bold**

_italic_   __bold__
```
*italic*   **bold**

_italic_   __bold__

***
###Horizontal Rule / Page Break

Three or more asterisks or dashes:
```
******

------
```
******

------
***

###Headers
```
# Header 1

## Header 2

### Header 3

```
# Header 1

## Header 2

### Header 3


***

###Lists
Unordered List:

```
* Item 1
* Item 2
    + Item 2a
    + Item 2b
```
* Item 1
* Item 2
    + Item 2a
    + Item 2b
    
Ordered List:

```
1. Item 1
2. Item 2
3. Item 3
    + Item 3a
    + Item 3b
```
1. Item 1
2. Item 2
3. Item 3
    + Item 3a
    + Item 3b
    
***

###R Code Chunks
R code will be evaluated and printed
```
{r}
summary(cars$dist)
summary(cars$speed)
```
```{r}
summary(cars$dist)
summary(cars$speed)
```

***

###Inline R Code
```
There were ` r nrow(cars)` cars studied
```
There were `r nrow(cars)` cars studied

***

###Links

Use a plain http address or add a link to a phrase:
```
http://example.com

[linked phrase](http://example.com)
```
http://example.com

[linked phrase](http://example.com)


***

###Images
Images on the web or local files in the same directory:
```
![alt text](http://example.com/logo.png)

```

***

###Blockquotes
```
A friend once said:

> It's always better to give
> than to receive.
```
A friend once said:

> It's always better to give
> than to receive.


***

###Inline Code
```
We defined the `add` function to
compute the sum of two numbers.
```
We defined the `add` function to
compute the sum of two numbers.

***

###LaTeX Equations
Inline equation:
```
This is the best equation ever $y=x^2/2$.  But this one isn't too shabby either, $\sum_{i=1}^n X_i$.  Don't forget to escape the `sqrt`, $\sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}$
```
This is the best equation ever $y=x^2/2$.  But this one isn't too shabby either, $\sum_{i=1}^n X_i$.  Don't forget to escape the `sqrt`, $\sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}$

Display equation:  
This is a decent equation, too.
```
$\sum_{i=1}^n X_i$
```
$\sum_{i=1}^n X_i$

***

###Tables
```
|Header |Column 1 | Column 2 | Column 3  |
|:--- |:---- |:----:| ----:|
|1. Row| is | is | is  |
|2. Row| left | nicely | right  |
|3. Row| aligned | centered | aligned  |  
```
|Header |Column 1 | Column 2 | Column 3  |
|:--- |:---- |:----:| ----:|
|1. Row| is | is | is  |
|2. Row| left | nicely | right  |
|3. Row| aligned | centered | aligned  |  

Reference Style Links and Images

***

###Links

A [linked phrase][id].
At the bottom of the document:

[id]: http://example.com/ "Title"


***

###Manual Line Breaks

End a line with two or more spaces:
```
Roses are red,  
Violets are blue.  
```
Roses are red,  
Violets are blue.  

***

###Miscellaneous
```
superscript^2^

~~strikethrough~~
```
superscript^2^

~~strikethrough~~
